name: wordvectors
0:
”Alexa ask word vectors king minus man plus woman”
”Alexa ask word vectors uncle minus man plus woman”
”Alexa ask word vectors doctor minus man plus woman”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word vectors
des: This skill will allow you to add and subtract words based on their word vectors or embeddings. It can run requests like "king minus man plus woman" which produces queen.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
